name: Parroting Pirates
description:
Submission for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam - Joined Together

Made by ToadBurger Studios

Controls

Move: WASD/Arrow Keys 

Fire Cannon: Space Bar

You are the captain of a courageous pirate fleet, sailing the flag ship from port to port in search of adventure! Unfortunately... your other ships are a little new, and they follow your every move to the letter. To make it safely to harbor, you must navigate a path that is safe for all ships, or your entire fleet will sink! Avoid the perilous obstacles, defeat your enemies, and pick up a few handy powerups along the way! Oh, and don't forget harbor right at the dock once you arrive!

Obstacles

Islands - Large land masses

Rocks - Small collections of stone that you cannon can destroy

Whirlpools - A vortex that's constantly growing and shrinking

Enemies

Rival Pirates - Shoots anything in front of them. Easy to destroy!

Kraken - Tougher than a boot. Throws boulders at whatever catches its eye

Powerups

Movement Buff

Fast Cannon

Grapeshot

Credits

David Draper  (HandODoom) - Game Design, Programming, Art, Music

James Giancioppo (Wugglett) - Game Design, Programming, Level Design

"Water Swirl, Small, 12.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
